description: This file defines a React component for managing connections and connectors, including listing existing connections, creating new ones, and testing or deleting them. It utilizes hooks, API calls, and multiple UI components.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches connections and connectors from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Handles creation of a new connection using provided connector and data.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Handles updating an existing connection with new configuration data.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a specified connection after confirmation.

methods.name: handleTest
methods.description: Tests a specific connection and alerts the result.
